title: NBA Finals Reactions and Shaedon Sharpe Projections | Upside High
description:
J. Kyle Mann and Jonathan Tjarks begin the pod by sharing their reactions to the NBA Finals. They then do a deep evaluation of rising NBA prospect Shaedon Sharpe, including his draft status, possible team destinations, and comps with current NBA players and other potential rookies, particularly Jaden Ivey (7:30).
Hosts: Jonathan Tjarks and J. Kyle Mann
Producer: Chris Sutton
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
